name: nexG Platforms
description:
nexG endeavours to provide a communication platform for a quick, seamless and secure flow of conversational interactions & transactions between businesses and consumers through their preferred choice of channel.
Our team is always synchronized with market needs and empowers companies to make effective, fast-paced communication.
We believe that brands in emerging markets will need to build unique customer experiences for different groups of people in order to find the right audience and sustainability for a product.
